ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of celery soup
des: "This is my favorite casserole for when I need to bring a dish to pass.  It is always requested!  It's a cheesy broccoli and rice casserole that is oh-so-good!"
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a 2-quart casserole dish combine soup, cheese sauce, rice, milk and broccoli; mix well.
Bake in preheated oven for 1 hour, or until lightly browned.
